page.title: 17 LES ADAMS CLUB
page.content:
I used to go to{Les Adams club}at L'Eree.It is run by a lady called Lesley Watson and a man called Smithy. At the club we play snooker,table tennis, mini football, hockey, badminton, chess and draughts.When it was lovely weather, we would go down to th slipway at L'Eree beach to have a barbeque. When it rained we would stay inside and play on the games. The club is on Mondays and it starts at half past six until half past eight.There is a{tuck shop}at our club.We can buy bags of crisps costing 12p.Panda Pops 12p chocolate bars 8p.chews at 1p.and Welly chews at 2p. each. The club is in Les Adams church hall.
BY{VICTORIA LE NOURY.
